entry.title: PatrickMcDonald/RealWorldFunctionalProgramming
entry.summary: Some examples from the book "Real World Functional Programming"

entry.title: cotowali/litsu
entry.summary:
Litsu

A statically-typed functional language that is transpiled into POSIX sh.

Example

(* fib.lit *)
let rec fib n =
  if n <= 1 then
    n
  else
    fib (n - 1) + fib (n - 2)
in fib 10

$ litc fib.lit | sh
55

Build

$ dotnet build
